trans-unit.source: Notify me of new comments by e-mail
trans-unit.target: Underret mig om nye kommentarer via e-mail

trans-unit.source:
%s has created a new comment on your website.
---
%s
---
View: %s Edit: %s
If you are moderating comments, you have to log in to the back end to publish it.
trans-unit.target:
%s har skrevet en kommentar på dit website.
---
%s
---
Vis: %s Rediger: %s
Hvis du modererer kommentarer, skal du logge ind for at udgive den.

trans-unit.source: Your comment has been added and is now pending for approval.
trans-unit.target: Din kommentar er tilføjet og afventer nu godkendelse.

trans-unit.source:
Hello %s,
please confirm that you want to be notified of new comments by e-mail on this page:
%s
---
Confirm: %s Cancel: %s
trans-unit.target:
Hej %s,
Bekræft venligst at du ønsker at blive underrettet via e-mail om nye kommentarer på denne side:
%s
---
Bekræft: %s Annuller: %s

trans-unit.source: A new comment has been added on %s
trans-unit.target: En ny kommentar er blevet skrevet til %s

trans-unit.source:
Hello %s,
a new comment has been added on a page you have subscribed to:
%s
---
To cancel your subscription, please click here: %s
trans-unit.target:
Hej %s,
En ny kommentar er blevet skrevet på en side du har tilmeldt underretning om:
%s
---
Afmelde underretninger: %s
